attributes.action: provide full government funding for the British Olympic Team.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government need to provide full funding for the British Olympic Team for training on the same scale as the USA team and the Russians. Their teams are fully funded and NOT part time athletes as many of ours are forced to become. If Britain is to become Great, it needs the full financial backing of the elected government to make it happen.
